Name: Alber Jose
description:
ALBER is 40 yeara old. He was born into a humble and hardworking family that taught him from a young age to do all the farm work. Thanks to this, today he owns some land with a variety of crops, thus generating sufficient income to support his household in the municipality of EL CARMEN DE BOLIVAR.

His drive, painstaking work and dedication made him into an exemplary success story. Every day he looks for new ways to keep advancing. For this reason he requests the support of the loan with which he wants to buy corn seeds, cassava, manure and fertilizers. In this way he will be able to progress.
